clues.name: The Riddle & Crystal
clues.content: All the lights in the house glowing bright, except one that lost its light. Seek the place where darkness dwells, there the Crystal's magic spells. (Find the broken light to find the Crystal. Use Crystal to ask Ghost YES/NO questions).

clues.name: Autopsy Report
clues.content: Toxin: Aconitum (Monkshood). Lethal. Likely ingested with food. Important: Identify who had access to the victim's meal.

clues.name: Chemist's Insight
clues.content: Chemicals used are similar to sleeping pills. Who has sleeping problems?

clues.name: Tech Guy's Hack (Text Message)
clues.content: Unknown Contact to Momo King: 'Are you sure about this? All I want is us to be together in business or not'
